FusionEngine::DestructableImage

FusionEngine::DestructableImage Class Reference

Provides a surface and methods to modify it. More...

#include <FusionDestructableImage.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Provides a surface and methods to modify it.

This class will be [depreciated] by the FusionPhysicsTerrain and FusionLevel implementation. DamageMap will be replaced by FusionHoleMap.

Remarks:
The ApplyDamageMap method is for efficianly syncronising the damage over a network. A DamageMap can be easyly syncronised in every FusionShipFrame. This also allows the History system to backtrack without loosing damage data.
